sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"居民，公民"之意。
means: citizen ： 指拥有某国国籍或有某地区合法身份的人，即公民。
civilian ： 指相对于军人或官员的平民百姓。
inhabitant ： 最普通用词，一般指常住居民。
resident ： 多指长期居住或暂时居住的居民，有时也指旅居者。
native ： 指土生土长的本地居民。

sentence.Network_en: Cairo has only thirteen square centimetres of green space for each inhabitant.
sentence.Network_cn: 开罗居民的人均绿地面积仅13平方厘米。

sentence.Network_en: the oldest inhabitant of the village
The tapeworm is an inhabitant of the intestine.
sentence.Network_cn: 绦虫是栖居肠内的寄生虫.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inhabit v 居住 inhabitant n 住户，居民 uninhabited a 杳无人迹的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inhabit v 居住 inhabitant n 住户，居民 uninhabited a 杳无人迹的.
英语常用的词根词缀_百度知道 ... signal（ 信号） - inhabitant（ 居住者）, contestant（ 竞争者）.
inhabitant的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... 居民 inhabitant n.常住居民 ,居民 inhabitant n.居民 inhabitant.

list.abs: relating to the Alps and their inhabitants .关于阿尔卑斯山及其阿尔卑斯山居民的。
英语单词词根词缀总结 - 梁秋的日志 - 网易博客 ... habitant 居住者 / inhabit 居住于 inhale 吸 /.
托福词汇表_百度文库 ... habitat 栖息地 inhabit 栖息于，居住在 evolve 进化.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) ... inhabit 居住于 inhabitable 适于居住的 inhabitancy 居住.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin inhabitare 'inhabit'

entry.def: The inhabitants of a place are the people who live there.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who inhabits a particular place

auth_sentence.content: E. coli is a normal inhabitant of the intestinal tract of warm-blooded animals.
auth_sentence.res_content: E. coli is a normal inhabitant of the intestinal tract of warm-blooded animals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: E. coli is a normal inhabitant of the intestinal tract of warm-blooded animals.

auth_sentence.content: We hear from one inhabitant of the city who witnessed just some of the atrocities committed there.
auth_sentence.res_content: We hear from one inhabitant of the city who witnessed just some of the atrocities committed there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We hear from one inhabitant of the city who witnessed just some of the atrocities committed there.

auth_sentence.content: The Texas Board of Education is clearly an inhabitant of one in their Home State.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Texas Board of Education is clearly an inhabitant of one in their Home State.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Texas Board of Education is clearly an inhabitant of one in their Home State.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assist帮助+ant……人→adj.帮助的,辅助的 n.助手,助教;辅助物
discord不合,不一致+ant……的→adj.不一致的,不调和的
extra超出+vag漫游,走+ant……的→走得过分→奢侈的
ex出+uber果实累累+ant……的→adj.[人]充满活力的;[植物]茂盛的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不知道的;无知的,愚昧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ignore不理,不顾,忽视+ant……的→adj.不知道的;无知的,愚昧的
in进入+toxic有毒的+ant……的→中毒了的→醉人的
repent后悔+ant……的→adj.对…感到悔恨的
resist抵抗+ant……的→adj.[to]抵抗的,有抵抗力的
retard延迟+ant……的→adj.延缓的,使迟滞的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 振动的,明快的,生气勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vibr摇摆+ant……的→振动的,有活力的
co共同+agul凝固+ant……剂→n.凝结剂
de去掉+odor气味+ant……剂→n.除臭剂
disinfect消毒+ant……剂→n.消毒剂
lubric滑+ant……剂→n.润滑剂
pollute弄脏,污染+ant物质→pollutant污染物质
retard延迟+ant……剂→n.延缓[作用]剂
stimul=sting刺+ant……剂→n.兴奋剂,刺激物
account计算,帐目+ant……人→n.会计人员,会计师
aspire渴望,追求+ant……人→aspirant
assist帮助+ant……人→adj.帮助的,辅助的 n.助手,助教;辅助物
consult商议,咨询+ant……人→n.顾问,商议者,咨询者
inhabit居住于+ant表示人→n.居民,住户
part部分+cip抓+ant……人→抓住成为部分→参与者
peas+ant……人→n.农夫,乡下人
tyr+ant……人→n.暴君
in进入+toxic有毒的+ant……的→中毒了的→醉人的
habit居住,习惯+ual……的→adj.习惯性的,惯常的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无人居住的,杳无人迹的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un无+inhabit居住+ed……的→无人居住的
habit居住,习惯→住一个地方→习惯了
habit居住,习惯+ant人→n.居住者
habit居住,习惯+at表示地方→住的地方
inhabit[v.居住于,存在于;栖息于]+ant人→n.居民,住户
co共同+habit居住→共同住一个地方
habit居住,习惯+u+ate表动词→v.使习惯于
in进入,里面+habit居住,习惯→住里面

means.word_mean: （某地的）居民, 住户; (栖息在某地区的)动物

sentences.en: The tapeworm is an inhabitant of the intestine.
sentences.cn: 绦虫是栖居肠内的寄生虫。

jushi.english: The tapeworm is an inhabitant of the intestine.
jushi.chinese: 绦虫是栖居肠内的寄生虫。

jushi.english: I lived in a small town of 5000 inhabitants.
jushi.chinese: 我住在一个有5000住户的小镇。

jushi.english: The flood was a danger to the livelihood of the inhabitants there.
jushi.chinese: 水灾对那里居民的生计是个威胁。
